title: Does Pyke have a super long grace period on his ult or something?
body:
In this clip he wasn't even close to killing the enemy, but gets the reset anyway.  Maybe the enemy only has to be standing in the little X he creates for him to get the reset even if he doesn't kill them?  If that's the case, then that's super dumb and should be removed imo.  Something like that is unintuitive and rewards him for missing his ult.

https://youtu.be/-mRYrf1vkmg?t=2612
